participant_1.background:
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.
I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show.
I love growing sunflowers
i am bald with a thick beard.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time in my garden, tending to my plants and watching them grow.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! I'm in a good mood because I just got back from the garden.
Oh, that's great! I love gardening too. I spent a lot of time in my garden last year.
Me too! I love growing sunflowers. What are your favorite plants to grow?
I like growing sunflowers too! They're so pretty and they make me happy. I also like growing tomatoes and peppers.
Tomatoes are great! I love making fresh tomato sauce. What do you like to do with your tomatoes?
I like to make tomato sauce too! I also like to make salsa and can my tomatoes.
That's awesome! I've never tried canning tomatoes, but I've heard it's really easy.
It is! It's just a matter of following the instructions on the canning jar.
I might have to try that sometime. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! I'm always happy to share my gardening tips.
